name: Min Max Quantity – Minimum/Maximum Quantity, Step Control & Price Limit for WooCommerce
author: StorePlugin

sections.description:
MinMax Quantities for WooCommerce help you to restrict minimum and maximum quantity for product. You can set the restriction globally, as well as individual product including variations. You can also set amount and quantity limits for cart and order.

ðŸ‘‰ Variations as Single Product Feature | Support | Purchase Pro

Key features:

  • Minimum and Maximum Quantity control.
  • Step control for quantity (multiples of X).
  • Quantity control for individual product.
  • Quantity control for product variation.
  • Step control for individual product and product variation.
  • Set Minimum and Maximum Quantity for Cart
  • Set Minimum and Maximum Quantity for Order

Premium features:

  • Set Minimum and Maximum Quantity for Category
  • Set Minimum and Maximum Quantity for Tag
  • Customize alert/Error Message for Quantity restriction

ðŸ‘‰ Get MinMax Quantities Pro

Enhance your store with our other plugins

  • Variations as Single Product for WooCommerce – Show variations as single product on shop, product category and search result page.
  • Advanced Custom Order Status for WooCommerce – Create, edit, delete or add new custom order statuses and trigger the custom emails when order status changes
  • Product Search for WooCommerce – Search products by SKU, title, category, attributes, tags, and custom taxonomies.
  • ShopElement – Elementor Addon for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
The Plugin installation process in WordPress is very easy and convenient. Simply follow the steps below to get started.

  1. Upload minmax-quantities-for-woocommerce plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the quantity restriction from WooCommerce -> Min Max Quantity

short_description: Control product min max quantity along with quantity steps. Also set quantity and amount limits for cart and order.
